 ##########
 File path: java/vector/src/main/codegen/templates/UnionVector.java
 ##########
 @@ -693,6 +693,9 @@ public int hashCode(int index) {
 
     @Override
     public int hashCode(int index, ArrowBufHasher hasher) {
+      if (isNull(index)) {
 
 Review comment:
   I don't think this is needed given the current implementation, is index would point to ZeroVector which would hash?

 Review comment:

liyafan82 commented on pull request #5752: ARROW-7020: [Java] Fix the bugs when calculating vector hash code
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5752#discussion_r340519217
 
 

 ##########
 File path: java/vector/src/main/codegen/templates/UnionVector.java
 ##########
 @@ -693,6 +693,9 @@ public int hashCode(int index) {
 
     @Override
     public int hashCode(int index, ArrowBufHasher hasher) {
+      if (isNull(index)) {
 
 Review comment:
   There is another problem here: the result of getVector(index) can be null. I have fixed this problem, and the above problem, by revising the implementation of isNull(index). 
   
   Pls take a look.

 Review comment:
